charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 108 months. This term consists of terms of 60 months in case 1:CR-01-193, and on each of Count 2 in cases 1:05-CR-006, 1:05-CR-203, 1:05-CR-228, 1:05-CR-232, 1:05-CR-252, 1:05-CR-253, 1:05-CR-256, 1:05-CR-0259, 1:05-CR-285, 1:05-CR-287, 1:05-CR-288, 1:05-CR-294, 1:05-CR-296, 1:05-CR-0305, 1:05-CR-0306, 1:05-CR-324, 1:05-CR-367, 1:05-CR-440 and 1:05-CR-456, and 108 months in case 1:05-CR-284, and on each of Counts 1 in cases 1:05-CR-006, 1:05-CR-203, 1:05-CR-228, 1:05-CR-232, 1:05-CR-252, 1:05-CR-253, 1:05-CR-256, 1:05-CR-259, 1:05-CR-285, 1:05-CR-287, 1:05-CR-288, 1:05-CR-294, 1:05-CR-296, 1:05-CR-305, 1:05-CR-306, 1:05-CR-324, 1:05-CR-367, 1:05-CR-440 and 1:05-CR-456 to be served concurrently. Said 108 month term is imposed to run concurrently with the term of imprisonment the defendant is serving in WD/MO, Dkt. No. 04-0222-01-CR-W-HFS. The Court notes that this sentence is not a departure, but reflects a sentence adjustment for 22 months that the defendant has served on the WD/MO that will not be credited by the Bureau of Prisons. The sentence also takes into account the 10 month sentence reduction imposed on March 11, 2010 pursuant to Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 35(b). Total Restitution $262.394.42; Total Special Assessments $4000.00

charges.charge_description: 18, 1708 and 2. THEFT OR RECEIPT OF STOLEN MAIL MATTER, AID, ABET(2)
